trends: There has been one other sighting in Nanticoke
There were no other sightings in Nanticoke on or around June 10th 2012
divs: sighting detailswent out side last night 6\10\2012, for a smoke beofre bed time. while outside i looked toward the sse sky and saw what i thought was an airraft. after watching it for a few seconds i noticed that the where no navigation lights. the object had an oragne\red color to it. it was travling at a quick pace and covered a large distance is short amount of time. it appeared to be travling in a straight line in a nne direction. while watching the object for approx. one minute, the object flashed and then disappeared. i remeber feeling odd while watching the object and amazed after it had disapeared.
